thread.title: Meet Ernie Hudson at Emagine Theaters
thread.title_full: Meet Ernie Hudson at Emagine Theaters

title: Meet Ernie Hudson at Emagine Theaters
text:
Ernie Hudson visiting Emagine theaters for Ghostbuster screenings 8:37 PM, Oct 23, 2015 Show Caption Previous Next 
(WXYZ) - Michigan native Ernie Hudson, best known for playing Winston Zeddemore in the film, "Ghostbusters," is returning home to meet with fans on Halloween weekend. 
Hudson will meet with fans, sign autographs and take pictures at three different metro Detroit Emagine Theatres. 
The theaters will show "Ghostbusters," which has been fully re-stored and re-mastered in 4K at different times throughout the nights he is there. 
On Friday, Oct. 30, Hudson will be at Emagine Rochester Hills 10 beginning at 4 p.m., with showings at 5:30 p.m., 7:45 p.m. and 10 p.m. 
Then, on Saturday, Oct. 31, Hudson will visit Emagine Royal Oak at 12 p.m., with showings at 1 p.m., 3:30 p.m., 5:30 p.m., 7:45 p.m. and 10 p.m. 
Finally, he will be at Emagine Canton on Sunday, Nov. 1 beginning at 12 p.m., with showings at 1 p.m., 3:30 p.m., 5:45 p.m. and 8 p.m. 
For more information, visit emagine-entertainment.com. Copyright 2015 Scripps Media, Inc. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed.
